#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);	
	int t,n;
	char ch;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cin>>s;
		int a[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			{cin>>a[i];
			a[i]-=1;
			}
			
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			ch=s[i];
			s[i]=s[a[i]];
			s[a[i]]=ch;
		}
	
		cout<<s<<endl;
	t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
